ingredients: [{"name": "crni luk", "units": "head", "amount": 1}, {"name": "prazi luk", "units": "piece", "amount": 1}, {"name": "ulje", "units": "ml", "amount": 30}, {"name": "svinjsko mleveno meso", "units": "g", "amount": 450}, {"name": "so", "units": "teaspoon", "amount": 1}, {"name": "crni biber", "units": null, "amount": "to taste"}, {"name": "beli biber", "units": "teaspoon", "amount": 0.5}, {"name": "paradajz pire", "units": "ml", "amount": 500}, {"name": "kore za lazanje", "units": "package", "amount": 1}, {"name": "brašno", "units": "tablespoons", "amount": 3}, {"name": "mleko", "units": "ml", "amount": 650}, {"name": "mozzarella", "units": "g", "amount": 200}]
instructions: Na ulju prodinstajte sitno seckani crni i prazi luk.
